1373850.name: SKIN
1373850.description:
SKIN is an otherworldly stealth game where you play as Artemis, Goddess of the Hunt, performing a ritual to summon an Eternal Night

Master bow combat, beastly transformations, and ancient blood rituals to solve puzzles, battle deranged gods, and carve a path through the darkness

HUNT BY MOONLIGHT

  • Stalk your prey in a dark and shifting world of crumbling temples and whispering ghosts
  • Bend moonlight to shapeshift into creatures of light and shadow and outwit your enemies
  • Speak to vengeful spirits with hidden motives to discover the dark secret of the forest
  • Hunt your tormentors in brutal boss fights

PAINT WITH BLOOD

  • Perform divination rites to gain new power and monstrous forms
  • Collect prophecies and speak with the dead to reveal the path forward
  • Sacrifice your prey with blood magic and plunge the world into darkness

S̱̗̻͉̦͉K̹̯̺̱IN ͔̩H̻̜̱̻̫͖̥I̘M͎͙͉̰͙̟ͅ ̹A̬̖͈̰̬L̗̣͙̦̮I̝̲̮̼̦V̤͉͎͈̲E͙̞̠̝̦̘̭
